name: Phase_M_Audit_Checklist
purpose: Audit and lock the planning runtime design prior to any implementation.

authority_and_scope: Planning runtime authority is explicitly derived from PXL
architecture_separation: Planning runtime has no execution hooks
Execution systems do not import planning runtime
No direct Planning → Execution path exists
governance_integration: All plans flow through governance review
Governance approval does not imply execution
Policy and tick governance remain mandatory
negative_capability_enforcement: No learning or adaptation loops exist
drift_prevention: Implementation is blocked until Phase-M exit

exit_requirements: All checklist items reviewed and satisfied
Explicit authorization to implement planning runtime recorded
notes: Failure to satisfy any item blocks Phase-M implementation.
